reviewText:
The ninjas are back and now they're having problems with that nasty heat of summer, no worries Onsokumaru  knows what to do, maybe asking what kind of underwear Shinobu is wearing will make his blood cold ... or warmer, or telling perverted stories to the devils in hell will make him go to heaven. Nonsense everywhere this volume is more perverted and hilarious than the first one, Because you'll see:

1 Onsokumaru's fantasy
2 Shinobu in her angel outfit
3 The best line of Sasuke - When Shinobu tells him she has to pee, just listen to his answer.
4 Onsokumaru  playing with Kaede's cell phone.
